definitions.text: how something is done or how it happens
examples: in the characteristic New York style

definitions.text: a particular functioning condition or arrangement
examples: switched from keyboard to voice mode

definitions.text: a classification of propositions on the basis of whether they claim necessity or possibility or impossibility
verb inflections that express how the action or state is conceived by the speaker
any of various fixed orders of the various diatonic notes within an octave
the most frequent value of a random variable
